lore:
The following was passed quietly through folklore.
"You mustn't touch the Evil Shard.
You mustn't speak of the Evil Shard.
You mustn't think of the Evil Shard.
This is because it has the power to destroy the world."
However, sinful foolish humans can't overlook even such a small fragment. They make use of it in order to fulfill their own selfish desires.
name: 마정석의 조각
